mapper.select: SELECT to_char(p1.statdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') statdate, ceil(to_number(p1.dsignpremium)) dsignpremium, p1.dsignqty FROM dm_quick_policy_time p1 where p1.statdate = (SELECT max(P2.statdate) FROM dm_quick_policy_time P2 where p2.producttypecode = '10' and p2.provinccode = '00000000' and p2.statdate >= trunc(#{sysdate} , 'DD') and p2.statdate < trunc(#{sysdate} , 'DD') + 1 and to_char(p2.statdate, 'HH24:mi') < to_char(#{sysdate}, 'HH24:mi')) and p1.producttypecode = '10' and p1.provinccode = '00000000'

SELECT to_char(P2.statdate, 'HH24:mi') statdate, p2.provinccode, p2.provincname, p2.producttypecode, p2.producttypename, p2.signpremium, p2.signqty, p2.dsignpremium, p2.dsignqty FROM dm_quick_policy_time P2 where p2.producttypecode = '10' and p2.provinccode = '00000000'
and p2.statdate >= trunc(#{sysdate} , 'DD') and p2.statdate < trunc(#{sysdate} , 'DD') + 1 and to_char(p2.statdate, 'HH24:mi') >= '08:00' and to_char(p2.statdate, 'HH24:mi') < to_char(#{sysdate}, 'HH24:mi') order by to_char(P2.statdate, 'HH24:mi')

SELECT SUBSTR(to_char(P2.statdate, 'HH24:mi'), 1, 4) || '0' statdate, SUM(P2.SIGNPREMIUM) signpremium, SUM(P2.SIGNQTY) signqty FROM dm_quick_policy_time P2 WHERE P2.PRODUCTTYPECODE = '10' AND P2.PROVINCCODE = '00000000' and p2.statdate >= trunc(#{sysdate} , 'DD') and p2.statdate < trunc(#{sysdate} , 'DD') + 1 and to_char(p2.statdate, 'HH24:mi') >= '08:00' and to_char(p2.statdate, 'HH24:mi') < to_char(#{sysdate}, 'HH24:mi') GROUP BY SUBSTR(to_char(P2.statdate, 'HH24:mi'), 1, 4) || '0'

select t.provincname, t.dsignpremium, t.dsignqty, t.msignpremium, t.msignqty, t.ysignpremium, t.ysignqty from dm_quick_policy_time t join (select max(statdate) statdate, provinccode, provincname from dm_quick_policy_time group by provinccode, provincname) t1 on t.statdate = t1.statdate and t.provinccode = t1.provinccode and t.provincname = t1.provincname where producttypecode = '10' and t.provinccode <> '00000000' and t.provinccode <> '00' order by t.provinccode
